```{r}
library(ROAuth)
library(streamR)

setwd("~/Documents/QMSS Term 2")
load("my_oauth.Rdata")

filterStream("tweets.json", track = c("Bernier Sanders", "Hilary Clinton"), timeout = 10, 
  oauth = my_oauth)

tweets.df <- parseTweets("tweets.json", simplify = TRUE)
```
